Member Function Documentation

void ConcatenatedModel::AppendModel ( Model *  pModel  )  [inline]

Append a model to the chain.

Note that a once added model becomes part of the ComcatenatedModel object, that is the ComcatenatedModel object destroys the added model in its destructor.
